value:
$WmMPID_水着レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Swim19,Face|Helbindi! There you are. We've been
looking for you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Swim19,Face|Did you just run off for no reason?
Quit being so useless...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Ugh. Why're you always on my case?!
How about you shut it, huh?! Leave
me alone for once!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Hee-hee! Things sure get lively when
we're all here together... It's so fun!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Yes, I...look forward to getting to
know you all better.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes! We did it! That should mean our
mission here is complete, right?$k$p$EFace_Pain|Er... Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|If I could just figure out how to sell
swimsuits outside of summer, I could
make piles and piles of cash...$k$p$EFace_Pain|N-no! Must resist...urge to scheme!
Get a hold of yourself, Anna!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A-are you all right, Commander?
You're shaking... You're not cold,
are you?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Forget it, Anna! Quit trying to make
a profit! No business...thoughts! No...
piles of...cash... Ughhh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|C-Commander?! She fainted! This
can't be good...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander, snap out of it—please!
Oh no... She's hot to the touch!$k$pI thought she was just fired up about
setting aside her desire for profits,
but...she's worked up an actual fever!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The strain must be overwhelming...$k$pFighting her urge for profit is like
fighting off a terrible malady, it
seems!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Pushing yourself too hard can do a
number on your health... I hope she'll
be all right!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ声,,Face|Products... Profits... Riches! Heehee...
Heeheehee...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's really out of it... Pull yourself
together, Commander Anna!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Maybe I put too much pressure on
her... Letting her be herself might be
less trouble in the long term.$k$p$EFace|Hmm... In the meantime, will you
help me carry her into her tent,
$Nu?$k$p$Sbs150|
